title: Manage a Property Insurance Claim
description: A hail storm damages the roof of a rental property. The property manager must file an insurance claim.

tasks.description: Document the damage with photos and obtain a repair estimate from a roofing contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Evidence of damage and a cost estimate are collected.

tasks.description: File a claim with the property owner's insurance company, providing all necessary documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The insurance claim is successfully filed.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the insurance adjuster's inspection and oversee the approved repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The roof is repaired and the claim is closed.
